fullplot: The rivalry between the manipulative boss of an advertising agency and her talented protègèe escalates from stealing credit to public humiliation to murder.
plot: The rivalry between the manipulative boss of an advertising agency and her talented protègèe escalates from stealing credit to public humiliation to murder.
title: Passion

tomatoes.consensus: For better as well as worse, Passion is vintage De Palma sexploitation -- although with a storyline sillier than most, it fails to generate as much heat as his steamiest work.
